Title: Teen Titans Go! To the Movies
Genre: Animation, Action, Comedy, Family, Musical, Sci-Fi
Writer: Michael Jelenic, Aaron Horvath, Jerry Siegel (Superman created by), Joe Shuster (Superman created by), Marv Wolfman (based on characters created by), George Pérez (based on characters created by), Arnold Drake (based on characters created by), Bob Kane (Batman and Robin created by), Bill Finger (Batman and Robin created by), William Moulton Marston (Wonder Woman created by)
Actors: Greg Cipes, Scott Menville, Khary Payton, Tara Strong
Plot: A villain's maniacal plan for world domination sidetracks five teenage superheroes who dream of Hollywood stardom.
